# This is generated by Telink cdt2cmake
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.10)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_LIBRARIES "")  # 禁用标准 C++ 库的自动链接
set(CMAKE_C_STANDARD_LIBRARIES "")    # 禁用标准 C 库的自动链接

enable_language(ASM C)
project(b85m_ble_single_connection_sdk)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_LIBRARIES "")  # 禁用标准 C++ 库的自动链接
set(CMAKE_C_STANDARD_LIBRARIES "")    # 禁用标准 C 库的自动链接

set(CMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE ON)
# toolchain : tc32
#set(TOOLCHAIN_PATH /your/path/to/toolchain/tc32)
set(CMAKE_C_COMPILER ${TOOLCHAIN_PATH}/bin/tc32-elf-gcc)
set(CMAKE_ASM_COMPILER ${TOOLCHAIN_PATH}/bin/tc32-elf-gcc)
set(CMAKE_LINKER ${TOOLCHAIN_PATH}/bin/tc32-elf-ld)
set(CMAKE_OBJDUMP ${TOOLCHAIN_PATH}/bin/tc32-elf-objdump)
set(CMAKE_OBJCOPY ${TOOLCHAIN_PATH}/bin/tc32-elf-objcopy)
set(CMAKE_PRINTSIZE ${TOOLCHAIN_PATH}/bin/tc32-elf-size)
set(CMAKE_C_LINK_EXECUTABLE "<CMAKE_LINKER> -v <FLAGS> <CMAKE_CXX_LINK_FLAGS> <LINK_FLAGS> <OBJECTS> -o <TARGET> <LINK_LIBRARIES>")
set(ProjDirPath ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/.)

function(recursive_glob folder sources_var)
    file(GLOB_RECURSE files RELATIVE ${folder} *.c *.S)
    list(APPEND ${sources_var} ${files})
    set(${sources_var} ${${sources_var}} PARENT_SCOPE)
endfunction()


recursive_glob(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} 825x_ble_remote_SOURCES)
list(FILTER 825x_ble_remote_SOURCES EXCLUDE REGEX "^boot/B87")
list(FILTER 825x_ble_remote_SOURCES EXCLUDE REGEX "^vendor/b85m_module")
list(FILTER 825x_ble_remote_SOURCES EXCLUDE REGEX "^vendor/b85m_master_kma_dongle")
list(FILTER 825x_ble_remote_SOURCES EXCLUDE REGEX "^vendor/b85m_hci")

add_executable(827x_hci ${827x_hci_SOURCES} )
add_executable(827x_module ${827x_module_SOURCES} )

set_target_properties(825x_ble_remote PROPERTIES SUFFIX "")
set_target_properties(825x_ble_sample PROPERTIES SUFFIX "")
set_target_properties(825x_module PROPERTIES SUFFIX "")

target_compile_options(825x_ble_remote PRIVATE $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:  -fpack-struct -fshort-enums -O2 -I${ProjDirPath}/./ -I${ProjDirPath}/vendor/common -I${ProjDirPath}/common -I${ProjDirPath}/drivers/8258 -D__PROJECT_8258_BLE_REMOTE__=1 -DCHIP_TYPE=CHIP_TYPE_825x -std=gnu99 -fshort-wchar -fms-extensions -finline-small-functions  -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -Wall>)
target_compile_options(825x_ble_sample PRIVATE $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:  -fpack-struct -fshort-enums -O2 -I${ProjDirPath}/./ -I${ProjDirPath}/vendor/common -I${ProjDirPath}/common -I${ProjDirPath}/drivers/8258 -D__PROJECT_8258_BLE_SAMPLE__=1 -DCHIP_TYPE=CHIP_TYPE_825x -std=gnu99 -fshort-wchar -fms-extensions -finline-small-functions  -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -Wall>)

target_link_options(825x_master_kma_dongle PRIVATE  -L${ProjDirPath}/proj_lib -T${ProjDirPath}/./boot.link --gc-sections)

target_link_options(827x_feature_test PRIVATE  -L${ProjDirPath}/proj_lib -T${ProjDirPath}/./boot.link --gc-sections)

target_link_options(827x_hci PRIVATE  -L${ProjDirPath}/proj_lib -T${ProjDirPath}/./boot.link --gc-sections)
target_link_options(827x_module PRIVATE  -L${ProjDirPath}/proj_lib -T${ProjDirPath}/./boot.link --gc-sections)

target_link_libraries(825x_ble_remote PRIVATE -llt_825x)
target_link_libraries(825x_ble_sample PRIVATE -llt_825x)
target_link_libraries(825x_ble_sample PRIVATE -llt_general_stack)
target_link_libraries(825x_module PRIVATE -llt_825x)
target_link_libraries(825x_module PRIVATE -llt_general_stack)
target_link_libraries(825x_feature_test PRIVATE -llt_825x)
target_link_libraries(825x_feature_test PRIVATE -llt_general_stack)
target_link_libraries(825x_master_kma_dongle PRIVATE -llt_825x)
target_link_libraries(825x_master_kma_dongle PRIVATE -llt_general_stack)
target_link_libraries(825x_hci PRIVATE -llt_825x)
target_link_libraries(825x_hci PRIVATE -llt_general_stack)
target_link_libraries(827x_master_kma_dongle PRIVATE -llt_827x)
target_link_libraries(827x_master_kma_dongle PRIVATE -llt_general_stack)
target_link_libraries(827x_ble_sample PRIVATE -llt_827x)
target_link_libraries(827x_ble_sample PRIVATE -llt_general_stack)
target_link_libraries(827x_feature_test PRIVATE -llt_827x)
target_link_libraries(827x_feature_test PRIVATE -llt_general_stack)
target_link_libraries(827x_ble_remote PRIVATE -llt_827x)
target_link_libraries(827x_ble_remote PRIVATE -llt_general_stack)
target_link_libraries(827x_hci PRIVATE -llt_827x)
target_link_libraries(827x_hci PRIVATE -llt_general_stack)
target_link_libraries(827x_module PRIVATE -llt_827x)
target_link_libraries(827x_module PRIVATE -llt_general_stack)



add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_ble_remote POST_BUILD COMMAND ${ProjDirPath}/./tl_check_fw.sh   825x_ble_remote   ${PROJECT_NAME})
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_ble_sample POST_BUILD COMMAND ${ProjDirPath}/./tl_check_fw.sh   825x_ble_sample   ${PROJECT_NAME})
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_module POST_BUILD COMMAND ${ProjDirPath}/./tl_check_fw.sh   825x_module   ${PROJECT_NAME})
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_feature_test POST_BUILD COMMAND ${ProjDirPath}/./tl_check_fw.sh   825x_feature_test   ${PROJECT_NAME})
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_master_kma_dongle POST_BUILD COMMAND ${ProjDirPath}/./tl_check_fw.sh   825x_master_kma_dongle   ${PROJECT_NAME})
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_hci POST_BUILD COMMAND ${ProjDirPath}/./tl_check_fw.sh   825x_hci   ${PROJECT_NAME})
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_master_kma_dongle POST_BUILD COMMAND ${ProjDirPath}/./tl_check_fw.sh   827x_master_kma_dongle   ${PROJECT_NAME})
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_ble_sample POST_BUILD COMMAND ${ProjDirPath}/./tl_check_fw.sh   827x_ble_sample   ${PROJECT_NAME})
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_feature_test POST_BUILD COMMAND ${ProjDirPath}/./tl_check_fw.sh   827x_feature_test   ${PROJECT_NAME})
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_ble_remote POST_BUILD COMMAND ${ProjDirPath}/./tl_check_fw.sh   827x_ble_remote   ${PROJECT_NAME})
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_hci POST_BUILD COMMAND ${ProjDirPath}/./tl_check_fw.sh   827x_hci   ${PROJECT_NAME})
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_module POST_BUILD COMMAND ${ProjDirPath}/./tl_check_fw.sh   827x_module   ${PROJECT_NAME})

add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_ble_remote POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJCOPY} -O binary  $<TARGET_FILE:825x_ble_remote> $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:825x_ble_remote>/825x_ble_remote.bin)
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_ble_sample POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJCOPY} -O binary  $<TARGET_FILE:825x_ble_sample> $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:825x_ble_sample>/825x_ble_sample.bin)
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_module POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJCOPY} -O binary  $<TARGET_FILE:825x_module> $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:825x_module>/825x_module.bin)
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_feature_test POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJCOPY} -O binary  $<TARGET_FILE:825x_feature_test> $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:825x_feature_test>/825x_feature_test.bin)
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_master_kma_dongle POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJCOPY} -O binary  $<TARGET_FILE:825x_master_kma_dongle> $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:825x_master_kma_dongle>/825x_master_kma_dongle.bin)
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_hci POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJCOPY} -O binary  $<TARGET_FILE:825x_hci> $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:825x_hci>/825x_hci.bin)
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_master_kma_dongle POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJCOPY} -O binary  $<TARGET_FILE:827x_master_kma_dongle> $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:827x_master_kma_dongle>/827x_master_kma_dongle.bin)
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_ble_sample POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJCOPY} -O binary  $<TARGET_FILE:827x_ble_sample> $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:827x_ble_sample>/827x_ble_sample.bin)
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_feature_test POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJCOPY} -O binary  $<TARGET_FILE:827x_feature_test> $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:827x_feature_test>/827x_feature_test.bin)
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_ble_remote POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJCOPY} -O binary  $<TARGET_FILE:827x_ble_remote> $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:827x_ble_remote>/827x_ble_remote.bin)
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_hci POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJCOPY} -O binary  $<TARGET_FILE:827x_hci> $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:827x_hci>/827x_hci.bin)
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_module POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJCOPY} -O binary  $<TARGET_FILE:827x_module> $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:827x_module>/827x_module.bin)

add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_ble_remote POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJDUMP} -x -l -S  -D $<TARGET_FILE:825x_ble_remote> > $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:825x_ble_remote>/825x_ble_remote.lst)
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_ble_sample POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJDUMP} -x -l -S  -D $<TARGET_FILE:825x_ble_sample> > $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:825x_ble_sample>/825x_ble_sample.lst)
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_module POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJDUMP} -x -l -S  -D $<TARGET_FILE:825x_module> > $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:825x_module>/825x_module.lst)
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_feature_test POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJDUMP} -x -l -S  -D $<TARGET_FILE:825x_feature_test> > $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:825x_feature_test>/825x_feature_test.lst)
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_master_kma_dongle POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJDUMP} -x -l -S  -D $<TARGET_FILE:825x_master_kma_dongle> > $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:825x_master_kma_dongle>/825x_master_kma_dongle.lst)
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_hci POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJDUMP} -x -l -S  -D $<TARGET_FILE:825x_hci> > $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:825x_hci>/825x_hci.lst)
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_master_kma_dongle POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJDUMP} -x -l -S  -D $<TARGET_FILE:827x_master_kma_dongle> > $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:827x_master_kma_dongle>/827x_master_kma_dongle.lst)
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_ble_sample POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJDUMP} -x -l -S  -D $<TARGET_FILE:827x_ble_sample> > $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:827x_ble_sample>/827x_ble_sample.lst)
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_feature_test POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJDUMP} -x -l -S  -D $<TARGET_FILE:827x_feature_test> > $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:827x_feature_test>/827x_feature_test.lst)
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_ble_remote POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJDUMP} -x -l -S  -D $<TARGET_FILE:827x_ble_remote> > $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:827x_ble_remote>/827x_ble_remote.lst)
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_hci POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJDUMP} -x -l -S  -D $<TARGET_FILE:827x_hci> > $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:827x_hci>/827x_hci.lst)
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_module POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_OBJDUMP} -x -l -S  -D $<TARGET_FILE:827x_module> > $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:827x_module>/827x_module.lst)

add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_ble_remote POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_PRINTSIZE}  -t $<TARGET_FILE:825x_ble_remote>)
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_ble_sample POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_PRINTSIZE}  -t $<TARGET_FILE:825x_ble_sample>)
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_module POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_PRINTSIZE}  -t $<TARGET_FILE:825x_module>)
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_feature_test POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_PRINTSIZE}  -t $<TARGET_FILE:825x_feature_test>)
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_master_kma_dongle POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_PRINTSIZE}  -t $<TARGET_FILE:825x_master_kma_dongle>)
add_custom_command(TARGET 825x_hci POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_PRINTSIZE}  -t $<TARGET_FILE:825x_hci>)
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_master_kma_dongle POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_PRINTSIZE}  -t $<TARGET_FILE:827x_master_kma_dongle>)
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_ble_sample POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_PRINTSIZE}  -t $<TARGET_FILE:827x_ble_sample>)
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_feature_test POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_PRINTSIZE}  -t $<TARGET_FILE:827x_feature_test>)
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_ble_remote POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_PRINTSIZE}  -t $<TARGET_FILE:827x_ble_remote>)
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_hci POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_PRINTSIZE}  -t $<TARGET_FILE:827x_hci>)
add_custom_command(TARGET 827x_module POST_BUILD COMMAND ${CMAKE_PRINTSIZE}  -t $<TARGET_FILE:827x_module>)
